description: The John Cage piece, As Slow As Possible, began 19 years ago and is to last 639 years.
title: John Cage musical work changes chord for first time in seven years
title_page: John Cage musical work changes chord for first time in seven years - BBC News
maintext: The three-movement composition from 1952 is for any combination of instruments, but instructs performers not to play them. Listeners instead hear the sound of the surrounding environment during the four minutes and 33 seconds the work lasts.
